author: Yuhang Zhao, Yanxin Lu
description: Experience the next level of digital efficiency with AFFiNE 0.11.0! Elevate your user journey with improved features, enhanced UI/UX, and streamlined document management. Explore how our updates make digital tasks smoother and more delightful.
md:
Welcome to the launch week of AFFiNE 0.11.0! We are thrilled to bring you a range of feature improvements and a simplified user operation process, leading to an enhanced overall efficiency of the product. **In short:**


* **Improvements in controlling numbered lists with greater ease.**


* **Optimizing CMD+K search results.**


* **Introducing additional methods for creating new pages.**


These enhancements are designed to simplify the organization and management of your documents, ensuring a more efficient and enjoyable digital workflow.





# Bug fixed:


In this section, you will discover the optimizations and fixes we have implemented for numbered lists and the CMD+K functionality compared to the previous version.


### 1. Numbered List Optimization: Seamless Control for Enhanced Document Clarity


Have you ever faced the challenge of being unable to modify the numbering in a list? Now, you have the **flexibility to interrupt and resume numbering at any point**, facilitating a seamless flow within each section. This improvement ensures **heightened clarity, better document structure**, and a more user-friendly and polished presentation of information.

### 2. Advanced Cmd+K Functionality for Streamlined User Experience


"**Cmd + K**" enhances searches, swiftly delivers relevant information, and introduces **new page creation** when results are absent. The "Duplicate" command simplifies workflow by **directly duplicating current page content**, especially beneficial for repetitive tasks.


<video muted autoplay loop preload="auto" playsinline>

</video>


### 3. Elevated Precision with Enhanced Cmd + K Search


Experience the power of **swift navigation** in our latest update! Just press **Cmd + K** and instantly **jump to the exact location of keywords within any block**. Save time and navigate with precision – because we know every second counts for you.

# UI/UX Improvements：


### 1. Manual Upgrade Check


After downloading the new version, if you're concerned about **how to upgrade old data, worry not**! In version 0.11.0, a dedicated page prompt for **manual refresh** has been added. Once you enter the local workspace, simply click on "Upgrade" and "Refresh" to **smoothly connect your new and existing data**!


<video muted autoplay loop preload="auto" playsinline>
  <source src="https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/-niahfALDYd6Cid99Ha_G6kt_Jlh5semTR9MXD-dy9k=" type="video/mp4" />
</video>


### 2. Simplified Favorites: Easy Page Creation and Intuitive Dragging


* **One-Click Creation of Favorited Pages with the "+" Button**


We know you have been bothered by the cumbersome steps of bookmarking articles. Now, with **a simple click on the "+" icon** to the right of the favorite button, you can instantly create a new page with the article already favoured!


<video muted autoplay loop preload="auto" playsinline>
  <source src="https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/0qoRPp0XF_oN0Ti2YrycqV9UfP6K9wBS05oCELXDGpM=" type="video/mp4" />
</video>


* **Drag-and-Drop for Favorites**


Dragging isn't limited to just collections anymore—you can also drag and rearrange the favourite bar now! **Simply drag your favorite articles** to their new spot on the sidebar. It's as easy as that!


<video muted autoplay loop preload="auto" playsinline>
  <source src="https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/YpvOoxbeIASyP0nCPVhP8YAa4AVVn-KZu0XmDYWl0jw=" type="video/mp4" />
</video>


### 3. New Empty Collection Style


Can't find where to create new collections? The optimized entry point is now more clearly visible! Simply click on "New Collection" to instantly establish your set of rules!


<video muted autoplay loop preload="auto" playsinline>
  <source src="https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/buZbnYfkL6CTqkp_fSJ8mgZsGVQCTiXQl5VQXcb18kE=" type="video/mp4" />
</video>


In actively addressing your concerns, we're committed to delivering **a more stable, feature-rich, and user-centric AFFiNE**. Explore refined controls for **numbered lists**, optimized **CMD+K search**, and **new page creation methods**. As Day 1 of AFFiNE 0.11.0 launch week concludes, the positive impact on your digital experience is exciting. Stay tuned for insights and updates as we unveil the full potential of AFFiNE 0.11.0!





# Get ready to unlock new levels of productivity


As we wrap up our AFFiNE 0.11.0 launch week, we want to extend our heartfelt appreciation for your interest and backing. Our journey to optimize AFFiNE is ongoing, and we're dedicated to making it better.
